name: Mr Vampire - action puzzles
description:
Solve these challenging puzzles. You will need precise aim and  smart use of your climbing spells.

The first two levels are easy, the next 3 are hard and the rest are really-really hard to solve.

 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The trick? Your spells can hit you too !
1. Enchant all animals on the map as your recipe requires !

Mister Vampire requires different animals for his potions. One problem is that they are far away. But you can use magic - just shoot your transformation spell towards them.

Another problem is that you do not have a spell for each animal - so , if you hit a frog - it will transform to chicken, but if you hit the new chicken - it will transform to cat. Hitting the cat will transform it back to frog and so on.

2. Unlock all levels and collect stars.

Different levels require different strategies. Also, since the game is physics based - you will have a different gameplay each time you start the level. The last 10 levels are the hardest ones !

3. Be smart with the use of your special spell - going upside down on the ceiling

This comes in handy if there are many obstacles between you and the animals . But you can only do it once per level! So choose wisely!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

This is a demo of the complete game , that is available on Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=achhobby.mrvampire.com
